episode.title: うちの会社の先輩は小さくて可愛い
My Senpai Is Small and Cute
Ma supérieure au boulot est petite et adorable
Uchi no Kaisha no Senpai wa Chiisakute Kawaii
episode.summary: Shinozaki Takuma is in his first year of employment at his new job, and is encountering a lot of the same struggles most new workers run into. But the presence of a cute, doting senpai named Katase Shiori might make the job worth it, no matter how tough it gets. Source: crunchyroll
